title: It seems impossible to get an S with Wukong.
body: I played Wukong mid lane in a match that lasted 40 mins and ended up with 24/3/6, 211 CS and the highest damage on the team with 50,000 and still got an A+. Is it impossible to get an S with him or something? I've played many matches that have had the same stats as this one and still kept getting A+.

replies.body:
40 mins 200cs????

you should have a min 100cs per 10 mins, thats why you didn't get an S bro. KDA also has less impact on your score than you think it does CS is literally how you get an S
So i should be having around 400 CS!?!?

> [{quoted}](name=Mokage,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=jEZGYJEf,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-08-25T10:24:06.690+0000)
>
> So i should be having around 400 CS!?!?

Roughly yes, im sure 325+ would be enough with a kda like that
With a vision score of 10 and no control wards placed? Likely.
